Song.title: Fairest Lord Jesus
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Joseph August Seiss Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Fairest Lord [Em]Je[A]-[D]sus! [D/F#]Ruler of all [G/B]na[A/C#]-[D]ture! [D/F#]O [G]Thou of [D/F#]God and [G/E]man [Bm/G#]the [Asus A]Son! [D/F#]Thee [G]will I [B7]che[Em]rish, [A7sus]Thee [A7]will I [G/B]ho[A/C#]-[D]nor, Thou, [D/F#]My soul’s [G]glory, [Bm/E]Joy, [A7]and [D]crown.
Verse 2: [D]Fair are the [Em]mea[A]-[D]dows, [D/F#]fairer still the [G/B]wood[A/C#]-[D]lands, [D/F#]Robed [G]in the [D/F#]blooming [G/E]garb [Bm/G#]of [Asus A]spring [D/F#]Je[G]sus is [B7]fair[Em]er, [A7sus]Je[A7]sus is [G/B]pur[A/C#]-[D]er, Who [D/F#]makes the [G]woeful [Bm/E]heart [A7]to [D]sing.
Verse 3: [D]Fair is the [Em]sun[A]-[D]shine, [D/F#]Fairer still the [G/B]moon[A/C#]-[D]light, [D/F#]And [G]all the [D/F#]twinkling [G/E]star[Bm/G#]ry [Asus A]host [D/F#]Je[G]sus shines [B7]bright[Em]er, [A7sus]Je[A7]sus shines [G/B]pur[A/C#]-[D]er, Than [D/F#]all the [G]angels [Bm/E]heav’n [A7]can [D]boast.
Verse 4: [D]Beautiful [Em]Sav[A]-[D]iour! [D/F#]Lord of all the [G/B]na[A/C#]-[D]tions! [D/F#]Son [G]of [D/F#]God and [G/E]Son [Bm/G#]of [Asus A]Man! [D/F#]Glo[G]ry and [B7]hon[Em]or, [A7sus]praise, [A7]ado[G/B]ra[A/C#]-[D]tion, Now [D/F#]and for[G]ever [Bm/E]more [A7]be [D]thine.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 fairest lord jesus ruler of all nature o thou of god and man the son thee will i cherish thee will i honor thou my souls glory joy and crown verse 2 fair are the meadows fairer still the woodlands robed in the blooming garb of spring jesus is fairer jesus is purer who makes the woeful heart to sing verse 3 fair is the sunshine fairer still the moonlight and all the twinkling starry host jesus shines brighter jesus shines purer than all the angels heavn can boast verse 4 beautiful saviour lord of all the nations son of god and son of man glory and honor praise adoration now and forever more be thine

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Fairest Lord [G]Je[A]-[D]sus! [D]Ruler of all [G]na[A]-[D]ture! [D]O [G]Thou of [D]God [D7]and [G]man [D]the [Asus A]Son! [D/F#]Thee [G]will I [B7]che[Em]rish, [A7sus]Thee [A7]will I [G]ho[A]-[D]nor, Thou, [D/F#]My soul’s [G]glory, [Asus]Joy, [A]and [D]crown.
Verse 2: [D]Fair are the [G]mea[A]-[D]dows, [D]fairer still the [G]wood[A]-[D]lands, [D]Robed [G]in the [D]bloom[D7]ing [G]garb [D]of [Asus A]spring [D/F#]Je[G]sus is [B7]fair[Em]er, [A7sus]Je[A7]sus is [G]pur[A]-[D]er, Who [D/F#]makes the [G]woeful [Asus]heart [A]to [D]sing.
Verse 3: [D]Fair is the [G]sun[A]-[D]shine, [D]Fairer still the [G]moon[A]-[D]light, [D]And [G]all the [D]twink[D7]ling [G]star[D]ry [Asus A]host [D/F#]Je[G]sus shines [B7]bright[Em]er, [A7sus]Je[A7]sus shines [G]pur[A]-[D]er, Than [D/F#]all the [G]angels [Asus]heav’n [A]can [D]boast.
Verse 4: [D]Beautiful [G]Sav[A]-[D]iour! [D]Lord of all the [G]na[A]-[D]tions! [D]Son [G]of [D]God [D7]and [G]Son [D]of [Asus A]Man! [D/F#]Glo[G]ry and [B7]hon[Em]or, [A7sus]praise, [A7]ado[G]ra[A]-[D]tion, Now [D/F#]and for[G]ever [Asus]more [A]be [D]thine.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 fairest lord jesus ruler of all nature o thou of god and man the son thee will i cherish thee will i honor thou my souls glory joy and crown verse 2 fair are the meadows fairer still the woodlands robed in the blooming garb of spring jesus is fairer jesus is purer who makes the woeful heart to sing verse 3 fair is the sunshine fairer still the moonlight and all the twinkling starry host jesus shines brighter jesus shines purer than all the angels heavn can boast verse 4 beautiful saviour lord of all the nations son of god and son of man glory and honor praise adoration now and forever more be thine
